snippet: It was unclear whether the North’s complaint against South Korea was an attempt to build an excuse for a future nuclear test or an overture aimed at drawing the United States back to the negotiating table.
abstract: North Korea says that although it has no current plans to conduct a nuclear test, South Korea is trying to provoke it into conducting one and taking other retaliatory actions, like an artillery attack; it is unclear whether the North’s complaint is an attempt to build an excuse for a future nuclear test or an overture aimed at drawing the United States back to the negotiating table.
lead_paragraph: It was unclear whether the North’s complaint against South Korea was an attempt to build an excuse for a future nuclear test or an overture aimed at drawing the United States back to the negotiating table.
